short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to find anyone's email address. Join the JointScout network to find emails on LinkedIn, GitHub, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing JointScout: The Community-Driven Tool Revolutionizing Talent Acquisition

JointScout is a cutting-edge Chrome extension that empowers recruiters by unearthing the most accurate contact information of potential candidates across renowned platforms like LinkedIn and Github. Our unique edge lies in our expansive user network, which pools data together, enhancing the precision of our services. 

Here's why JointScout is your ultimate recruitment partner:

● Collaborative Intelligence: JointScout's strength lies in the power of its user network. With collective data from users worldwide, we locate accurate emails of professionals across various platforms, ensuring you connect effectively with potential candidates.

● Works Where You Work: JointScout is designed to work in the background of websites like LinkedIn and Github, where you're already spending your time sourcing. By adding minimal UI elements, we ensure that your experience remains undisturbed while you benefit from our services.

● Completely Free and No Account Needed: JointScout believes in seamless service. That's why our extension is completely free, and you don't even need to create an account with us. Install and start using JointScout right away!

JointScout isn't just a recruitment tool—it's a community-driven platform designed to elevate your talent acquisition process. Whether you're a recruiter, HR professional, or talent acquisition specialist, JointScout ensures you find the best jobs for your candidates.

Join the community-driven revolution with JointScout. Download the JointScout Chrome extension today and experience a new era of collaborative recruitment.

For any questions or inquiries, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@jointscout.com.

Download JointScout now, and redefine your talent acquisition process!
